mapper.sql: sensor_id, project_id, monitor_point, monitor_type, smu_number, smu_channel, sensor_number, sensor_type, sensor_model, sensor_longitude, sensor_latitude, sensor_place, sensor_depth
mapper.select: select ssld.sensor_id,ssld.monitor_point,ssld.monitor_type,ssld.smu_channel as sen_smu_channel,ssld.sensor_number as sen_sensor_number,ssld.sensor_type,ssld.sensor_model,ssld.sensor_place,ssld.sensor_depth,sl.* from ( (select sen.*,MAX(sld.id) as max_id from (sensor sen LEFT JOIN ${_parameter.param1} sld on sen.sensor_number=sld.sensor_id and sen.smu_number=sld.smu_cms_id and sen.smu_channel=sld.smu_cms_channel) where sen.project_id= #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and sen.monitor_type= #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER} GROUP BY sen.sensor_number) ssld LEFT JOIN ${_parameter.param1} sl on ssld.max_id=sl.id)
mapper.insert: insert into sensor (sensor_id, project_id, monitor_point, monitor_type, smu_number, smu_channel, sensor_number, sensor_type, sensor_model, sensor_longitude, sensor_latitude, sensor_place, sensor_depth) values (#{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{monitorPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{smuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{smuChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sensorDepth,jdbcType=REAL})

mapper.update:
update sensor
project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
monitor_point = #{monitorPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
monitor_type = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
smu_number = #{smuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
smu_channel = #{smuChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_number = #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_type = #{sensorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_model = #{sensorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_longitude = #{sensorLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_latitude = #{sensorLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_place = #{sensorPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sensor_depth = #{sensorDepth,jdbcType=REAL},
where sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update sensor set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, monitor_point = #{monitorPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, monitor_type = #{monitorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, smu_number = #{smuNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smu_channel = #{smuChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_number = #{sensorNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_type = #{sensorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_model = #{sensorModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_longitude = #{sensorLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_latitude = #{sensorLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_place = #{sensorPlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sensor_depth = #{sensorDepth,jdbcType=REAL} where sensor_id = #{sensorId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
